ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] I posted this to the Everwhatever boards and to the   Concert Hall
ygData.msgSnippet: disco 2 is the commander/brogg/pickler area behind the door on the platform in disco.  there s a door behind where grup spawns and it s back in that area.
ygData.messageBody:
disco 2 is the commander/brogg/pickler area behind the door on the platform in
disco. there's a door behind where grup spawns and it's back in that area.


At 12:52 PM 10/16/00 -0400, you wrote:
>Well, I don't know the difference between disco and disco 2, but I spent all Sunday camped in the room where
>the scarab spawns (to the side of the room where the grup spawns) and I have no idea how anyone could think
>that a Bard would be sufficient (without a level 60 puller, as Jeffrey wrote). I'd repeated that based on
>comments I'd received in game. We would have been dead/evaced at least four times. Thank goodness for level
>57 Enchanters.
>
>Kenross Cantoforjado, 53 songs, Innoruuk
>
>
>Jeffrey Sue wrote:
>
> > having spent all weekend in dicso 2 and breaking disco on the way in, i think disco would only
> > be doable with a level 60 puller. disco 2 you might be able to get away with a bard charming if
> > you've also got a necro or a pally/cleric who is good at rooting stuff away from the fight. in the
> > ''library'' (what a cool looking room btw) we had a couple fights where we ended up killing 6 in
> > the same fight, but we also had some where we were able to kill 2, then 1 more, then a couple
> > roamers in separate fights.
> >
